problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, ∠C = N_0, AB = AE = N_1, AE and BD intersect at point F, AF = 2 EF. Then the length of BC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AD=BC,AD∥BC,∴△AFD∽△EFB,∴\frac{BE}{AD}=\frac{EF}{AF},∵AF=2EF,∴AD=BC=2BE,∵BE=5,∴BC=10,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质和相似三角形的性质和判定,能求出△AFD∽△EFB是解此题的关键．
